original: @265b * // dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sdom tshig bzhugs /
analyzed: @265b * // dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sdom tshig bzhugs /

original: # // dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: # // dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the holy ones.

original: bden pa dbyer med dus 'khor lo //
analyzed: bden pa dbyer med dus 'khor lo //
translated: The indivisible truth is the wheel of time.

original: shes bya'i cha nas gnyis zhes bya //
analyzed: shes bya'i cha nas gnyis zhes bya //

original: brjod bya dang ni rjod byed do //
analyzed: brjod bya dang ni rjod byed do //

original: brjod bya bden pa gnyis yin te //
analyzed: brjod bya bden pa gnyis yin te //

original: kun rdzob phyi nang gzhan dang gsum //
analyzed: kun rdzob phyi nang gzhan dang gsum //

original: phyi ni 'chags gnas 'jig pa ste //
analyzed: phyi ni 'chags gnas 'jig pa ste //

original: chags pa rten dang brten pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa rten dang brten pa'o //

original: rten ni rgyu dang go rims dbyings //
analyzed: rten ni rgyu dang go rims dbyings //

original: rang bzhin kha dog ming dang ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin kha dog ming dang ni //
translated: The nature is color, name,

original: yi ge grangs dang tshad dag go //
analyzed: yi ge grangs dang tshad dag go //
translated: syllable, number, and measure.

original: rgyu ni las kyi 'dus byas nas //
analyzed: rgyu ni las kyi 'dus byas nas //

original: rdul phran dag las skyes par 'dod //
analyzed: rdul phran dag las skyes par 'dod //

original: stong dang rlung sogs rim pa'o //üîΩdbyings ni gzhu sogs rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: stong dang rlung sogs rim pa'o // dbyings ni gzhu sogs rang bzhin ni //

original: g-yo sogs kha dog sngo la sogs //
analyzed: g-yo sogs kha dog sngo la sogs //

original: ming ni rlung sogs ri la sogs //
analyzed: ming ni rlung sogs ri la sogs //

analyzed: yi ge ya ra la sogs pa'o //

original: grangs ni rlung dang mtsho yi bar //
analyzed: grangs ni rlung dang mtsho yi bar //

analyzed: tshad ni rngams dang mtha' skor ro //

original: brten pa sems can zhes bya ste //
analyzed: brten pa sems can zhes bya ste //

analyzed: rgyu dang ming gi rab dbye dang // so so'i gnas dang tshe tshad dang // sa bon yi ger rab shes bya //

analyzed: gnas ni rlung dang srid rtse'i bar //

analyzed: tshe tshad lo dang bskal pa'i grangs //

analyzed: sa bon yi ge ka la sogs //

analyzed: 'chags pa sdud par shes par bya //

original: gnas pa rnam pa gnyis yin te //
analyzed: gnas pa rnam pa gnyis yin te //

analyzed: bstan pa dus dang byed pa rtsis //

original: 'jig pa sa sogs rim zhugs pas //
analyzed: 'jig pa sa sogs rim zhugs pas //

analyzed: gi dus dang rgyu dag dang // ngo bo rkyen rnams rdzogs dus so //

analyzed: rkyen ni ma yis rdo zos mthus //
